song.title: Forever Reign
song.lyrics:
[1] . A You are good, You are good . When there's nothing good in me . E/G# You are love, You are love . On display for all to see || . A You are light, You are light . When the darkness closes in . E/G# You are hope, You are hope . A You have covered all my sin
[C] .A E/A Oh, I’m running to Your arms . F#m I’m running to Your arms . E/F# The riches of Your love . E D Will always be enough || . F#m7 E D Nothing compares to Your embrace . F#m E D (C) Light of the world, forever reign --- [2] You are peace, You are peace When my fear is crippling You are true, You are true Even in my wandering || You are joy, You are joy You're the reason that I sing You are life, You are life, In You death has lost it's sting
[3] You are more, You are more Than my words will ever say You are Lord, You are Lord All creation will proclaim || You are here, You are here In Your presence I'm made whole You are God, You are God Of all else I'm letting go
[b] .F#m My heart will sing, .D No other name .A E Jesus, Jesus
